content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Iron plate production at position(x=52.0, y=-80.0)
Consists of a furnace at position(x=52.0, y=-80.0) with iron ore and coal.

### Iron plate production at position(x=52.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of a furnace at position(x=52.0, y=-82.0) with iron plate result.

### Iron plate production at position(x=52.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of a furnace at position(x=52.0, y=-84.0) with no ingredients to smelt.

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when inserting items into a furnace
- Ensure the furnace does not already contain ingredients that are incompatible with the item being inserted.
- Check the furnace's current ingredients before attempting to insert new items.
- Make sure to clear the furnace of any existing ingredients before inserting new ones, especially if they are of a different type.
